inference module¶

inference.eval(model, test_dataloader)[source]¶

This function acts as a controller for inference Param : model Param-type : torch trained model over our dataset Param : test_dataloader Param-type : Object of CORD-Dataset class Returns : preds_val, out_label_ids, labels

inference.results_test(preds, out_label_ids, labels)[source]¶

This function produces evaluation metrices for the test results Param : preds Param-type : list of prediction Param : out_label_ids Param-type : list of ids of actual outputs Param : labels Param-type : list of actual labels Returns : classification report of results

inference.run_inference(model)[source]¶

This function Runs main inference over the test files stored in test dir Params : model Param-type : torch model Returns : None
